groceries_high.message: Groceries running high — +20% vs your average week.
groceries_high.suggestion: Auto-move $15/week into Groceries Goal to smooth spend.

delivery_streak.message: Food delivery is trending up — 3× this week.
delivery_streak.suggestion: Set a ‘2 per week’ soft limit with friendly reminders.

paycheck_deposit.message: Deposit detected — a good moment to pay yourself first.
paycheck_deposit.suggestion: Move 10% ($185) to your Emergency Goal automatically.

slow_fallback.message: Model is slow — showing a safe default.
slow_fallback.suggestion: You can still move money or view budgets manually.

error.message: Model unavailable. You’re in control — try again later.
error.suggestion: Manual budgeting and goals remain available.
